question: Where is the headquarters of the International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ)?
explanation: Recently, the International Consortium of Investigative Journalists (ICIJ) has released a global investigation 'The Paradise Papers' that reveals the offshore interests and activities of some of the world's most powerful people and companies, including information about at least 31,000 persons or parties. India ranked 19th out of the 180 countries represented in the data in terms of the number of names.
